workflow.name: Download videos from any platform to Google Drive with RapidAPI integration
workflow.description:
## üöÄ All-In-One Video Downloader to Google Drive (via RapidAPI best All-In-One Video Downloader)

**Description:**  
This n8n workflow automates the process of downloading videos from any supported platform (like LinkedIn, Facebook, or Instagram) using the [**RapidAPI best All-In-One Video Downloader**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader). It then uploads the video to your Google Drive and shares it publicly, while logging any failures in Google Sheets for tracking.

---

## üì¶ Node-by-Node Breakdown

| üß© Node Name                   | üìù One‚ÄëLine Explanation                                                       |
|-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **On form submission**        | Triggers the workflow when a user submits a video URL through a web form.    |
| **All in one video downloader** | Sends a POST request to [**RapidAPI best All-In-One Video Downloader**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader) to fetch downloadable video links. |
| **If**                        | Checks whether the API response includes an error and routes accordingly.     |
| **Download mp4**              | Downloads the video using the direct media URL received from the API.        |
| **Upload To Google Drive**    | Uploads the MP4 file to a designated folder in your Google Drive.            |
| **Google Drive Set Permission** | Makes the uploaded file publicly shareable with a viewable link.           |
| **Wait**                      | Adds a short delay before logging errors to prevent duplicate entries.       |
| **Google Sheets Append Row**  | Logs failed download attempts with the original URL and status as `N/A`.     |

---

## ‚úÖ Benefits of This Flow 

- üîÅ **End-to-End Automation**: From user input to shareable video link‚Äîno manual steps required.
- üåê **Supports Multiple Platforms**: The [**RapidAPI best All-In-One Video Downloader**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader) supports sites like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and more.
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Smart Error Handling**: Automatically logs failed download attempts into Google Sheets for retry or audit.
- ‚òÅÔ∏è **Cloud Ready**: Videos are stored in Google Drive with instant public access.
- üìä **Trackability**: Logs failures, timestamps, and source URLs for easy debugging or analytics.
- üß© **Modular Setup**: Easily expand this in n8n to include Slack notifications, email alerts, or tagging.

---

## üîÅ Use Cases

- üé¨ **Social Media Video Archiving**: Download and store content (Reels, posts, stories) into Drive for future use.
- üßë‚Äçüè´ **Educational Sharing**: Teachers can collect useful videos and share links with students.
- üìö **Content Curation**: Bloggers or content managers can create a media archive from multiple platforms.
- ü§ù **Team Automation**: Teams submit links, and the workflow handles download + Drive share link generation.
- üìâ **Error Tracking for Ops**: Failed URLs are tracked in Google Sheets for retry, monitoring, or debugging.

---

## üß† Final Thoughts

This workflow leverages the power of n8n and [**RapidAPI best All-In-One Video Downloader**](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader) to create a **fully automated pipeline** for capturing video content from across the web. It‚Äôs ideal for educators, marketers, content curators, or developers who want to streamline video storage and access using Google Drive.

---
## üîë How to Get API Key from RapidAPI [Best All-In-One Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader)

Follow these steps to get your API key and start using it in your workflow:

1. **Visit the API Page**  
   [üëâ Click here to open Best All-In-One Video Downloader on RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader)

2. **Log in or Sign Up**  
   - Use your **Google**, **GitHub**, or email account to sign in.  
   - If you're new, complete a quick sign-up.

3. **Subscribe to a Pricing Plan**  
   - Go to the **Pricing** tab on the API page.  
   - Select a plan (free or paid, depending on your needs).  
   - Click **Subscribe**.

4. **Access Your API Key**  
   - Navigate to the **Endpoints** tab.  
   - Look for the `X-RapidAPI-Key` under **Request Headers**.  
   - Copy the value shown ‚Äî this is your API key.

5. **Use the Key in Your Workflow**  
   - In your n8n workflow (HTTP Request node), replace:
     ```text
     "x-rapidapi-key": "your key"
     ```
     with:
     ```text
     "x-rapidapi-key": "YOUR_ACTUAL_API_KEY"
     ```

---

‚úÖ You‚Äôre now ready to use the [Best All-In-One Video Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/best-all-in-one-video-downloader) with your automated workflows!

parameters.content:
## üü¢ **1. On form submission**
- **Purpose:** Acts as the trigger for the workflow.  
- **Functionality:** Displays a form with a single field (`URL`) where users can enter the  video link.  
- **Output:** Passes the entered URL to the next node for processing.

## üåê **2. All In One Downloader**
- **Purpose:** Fetch downloadable MP4 link.  
- **Functionality:** Sends a `POST` request to **RapidAPI ALl in one Video Downloader API**, passing the URL from the form.  
- **Output:** Receives a JSON response containing downloadable media links.

## üîç **3. If**
- **Purpose:** Check for API errors.  
- **Functionality:** Evaluates if the response contains an `error` field.  
- **Output:** 
  - ‚úÖ **True Path:** Proceeds to download the MP4.  
  - ‚ùå **False Path:** Goes to error handling (Wait + Sheets logging).

## ‚¨áÔ∏è **4. Download mp4**
- **Purpose:** Download the video file.  
- **Functionality:** Uses the media URL from the previous API response to download the MP4 video.  
- **Output:** Stores the raw MP4 binary for upload.

-

## ‚òÅÔ∏è **5. Upload To Google Drive**
- **Purpose:** Store video in Google Drive.  
- **Functionality:** Uploads the downloaded MP4 into the specified Drive folder.  
- **Output:** Returns a file ID for the uploaded file.

## üîë **6. Google Drive Set Permission**
- **Purpose:** Make the file publicly accessible.  
- **Functionality:** Sets file permissions to `Anyone with the link can view`.  
- **Output:** Provides a sharable `webViewLink`.

## ‚è±Ô∏è **8. Wait**
- **Purpose:** Delay before logging failures.  
- **Functionality:** Pauses workflow execution to avoid instant sheet logging when API errors occur.  
- **Output:** Prevents rapid consecutive writes to Google Sheets.

## üìë **9. Google Sheets Append Row**
- **Purpose:** Log failed conversions.  
- **Functionality:** Appends a row with:
  - `URL` ‚Üí Original LinkedIn link  
  - `Drive_URL` ‚Üí `N/A` (indicating download failure)  
- **Output:** Tracks failed attempts separately.

## üß© All-In-One Video Downloader and Google Drive Uploader

### üìÑ Workflow Description

This workflow allows users to submit any video URL through a form and automates the process of:

1. Extracting a downloadable video link using the **RapidAPI All-In-One Video Downloader**.
2. Downloading the video (MP4 format).
3. Uploading the video to a connected **Google Drive** account.
4. Making the uploaded file **publicly shareable**.
5. Logging any failed download attempts to a **Google Sheet**.

---

### ‚úÖ Features

- üîó **Form Trigger:** Accepts video URLs from users via a simple form.
- üåê **Universal Video Support:** Uses an API that supports platforms like LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and more.
- üì• **Video Downloading:** Automatically fetches the MP4 from the response.
- ‚òÅÔ∏è **Drive Upload:** Stores the downloaded video in Google Drive.
- üîì **Permission Setup:** Shares the uploaded video with ‚ÄúAnyone with the link‚Äù access.
- üßæ **Error Logging:** Records failed attempts (URL + failure info) in a Google Sheet for future analysis.

---

### üîÅ Example Use Cases

- Save personal social media videos directly to cloud storage.
- Build a central media archive from various platforms.
- Track failed downloads for debugging or retry purposes.

---

### üöß Dependencies

- ‚úÖ RapidAPI Key for the video downloader API.
- ‚úÖ Google Drive OAuth credentials.
- ‚úÖ Google Sheets access (Service Account or OAuth).

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
